subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following tribes was a major part of the ancient Rajasthan society?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान समाज में निम्नलिखित जनजातियों में से कौन सी प्रमुख थी?
explanation_en: Gurjara tribe played a significant role in shaping the ancient Rajasthan society.
explanation_hi: गुर्जर जनजाति ने प्राचीन राजस्थान समाज को आकार देने में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the primary source of livelihood for the people of ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान के लोगों का मुख्य आय साधन क्या था?
explanation_en: Agriculture was the primary source of livelihood for the people of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कृषि प्राचीन राजस्थान के लोगों का मुख्य आय साधन था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major aspect of ancient Rajasthani culture?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी संस्कृति का कौन सा पहलू प्रमुख था?
explanation_en: Hospitality was a major aspect of ancient Rajasthani culture.
explanation_hi: मेहमाननवाज़ी प्राचीन राजस्थानी संस्कृति का एक प्रमुख पहलू था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the dominant religion in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में प्रमुख धर्म क्या था?
explanation_en: Hinduism was the dominant religion in ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: हिंदू धर्म प्राचीन राजस्थान में प्रमुख धर्म था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a common social institution in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में निम्नलिखित सामाजिक संस्थानों में से कौन सा आम था?
explanation_en: Jati Panchayat was a common social institution in ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जाति पंचायत प्राचीन राजस्थान में आम सामाजिक संस्थान था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the primary source of water in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में जल का प्राथमिक स्रोत क्या था?
explanation_en: Wells were the primary source of water in ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कुएँ प्राचीन राजस्थान में जल का प्राथमिक स्रोत थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major aspect of ancient Rajasthani architecture?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी वास्तुकला का कौन सा पहलू प्रमुख था?
explanation_en: Use of Red Sandstone was a major aspect of ancient Rajasthani architecture.
explanation_hi: लाल पत्थर का उपयोग प्राचीन राजस्थानी वास्तुकला का एक प्रमुख पहलू था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the primary mode of transportation in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में परिवहन का मुख्य साधन क्या था?
explanation_en: Camels were the primary mode of transportation in ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: चमगादड़ प्राचीन राजस्थान में परिवहन का मुख्य साधन थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a common occupation in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में निम्नलिखित व्यवसायों में से कौन सा आम था?
explanation_en: Trade and Commerce was a common occupation in ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: व्यापार और वाणिज्य प्राचीन राजस्थान में आम व्यवसाय था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the role of women in ancient Rajasthani society?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज में स्त्रियों का भूमिका क्या थी?
A_en: Women were considered inferior to men
B_en: Women were considered equal to men
C_en: Women were considered superior to men
D_en: Women had limited rights and freedoms
D_hi: महिलाओं के पास सीमित अधिकार और स्वतंत्रता थी
explanation_en: Women had limited rights and freedoms in ancient Rajasthani society.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज में महिलाओं के पास सीमित अधिकार और स्वतंत्रता थी।
